customer: The identifier of the customer to subscribe.

items.about_items: A list of up to 20 subscription items, each with an attached price.
items.billing_thresholds: Define thresholds at which an invoice will be sent
items.price: The ID of the price object.
items.tax_rates: A list of Tax Rate ids.

cancel_at_period_end: Boolean indicating whether this subscription should cancel at the end of the current period.
default_payment_method: ID of the default payment method
metadata: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object.
